description: IBM and Apple, Bank of America's earnings report, and maximizing email effectiveness.
title: PODCAST: Unlikely tech friends
contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Once notorious enemies, IBM and Apple have announced a partnership, with IBM developing more than 100 business apps for Apple. Plus, with Bank of America's disappointing earnings report, a look at what banks are dealing with this profit reporting season. Also, more on how campaign strategists maximize the effectiveness of email.

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: Once notorious enemies, IBM and Apple have announced a partnership, with IBM developing more than 100 business apps for Apple. Plus, with Bank of America's disappointing earnings report, a look at what banks are dealing with this profit reporting season. Also, more on how campaign strategists maximize the effectiveness of email.
teaser: IBM and Apple, Bank of America's earnings report, and maximizing email effectiveness.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 16, 2014
